A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has some fun. exciting\, and surprising moments. It is enjoyable as a stand alone movie. My wife may have hit it on the head\, though\, when she said\, “I’m not sure if the world needs too many more Star Wars movies.” The themes get repetitive—dark vs. light conflict\, cute droids save the day\, small parties infiltrate the mothership against all odds\, etc. The series is almost James Bond-like in the need to be adhere to what has come before. For that reason\, while the movie is definitely enjoyable\, it struggles to recreate the magic of Episode IV and Episode V. The backdrop is becoming too familiar.
